name: Continental Aero Flying School
about: Continental Aero Flying School, established in 1980, is a pioneering aviation institution in the Philippines. With a rich heritage spanning over four decades, we are committed to providing top-notch aviation education and training. Our mission is to promote the value of learning, self-worth, and quality performance among students and staff. Located at the Mactan-Cebu International Airport, our school offers a diverse fleet equipped with cutting-edge glass cockpit technology and state-of-the-art avionics. We pride ourselves on an impeccable safety record, recognized by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines. Our comprehensive training programs include Private Pilot Licence, Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence, all adhering to strict ICAO standards. We are dedicated to quality training and supportive learning environments, ensuring our students are well-prepared for their future in aviation.
